    2019-11-05

    testing.Rmd
    # Number of disasters by year
library(dplyr)
data = round(boot::coal) %>% 
  group_by(date) %>% 
  count()

# See it
data
    ## # A tibble: 81 x 2
## # Groups:   date [81]
##     date     n
##    <dbl> <int>
##  1  1851     1
##  2  1852     7
##  3  1853     5
##  4  1854     1
##  5  1856     1
##  6  1857     5
##  7  1858     4
##  8  1859     1
##  9  1860     2
## 10  1861     5
## # ... with 71 more rows
    library(mcp)
segments = list(
  n ~ 1,  # intercept-only
  1 ~ 1  # intercept-only
)

fit = mcp(segments, data, family = poisson(), par_x = "date")
    ## Compiling model graph
##    Resolving undeclared variables
##    Allocating nodes
## Graph information:
##    Observed stochastic nodes: 81
##    Unobserved stochastic nodes: 3
##    Total graph size: 824
## 
## Initializing model
## 
##    user  system elapsed 
##    6.20    0.24    6.47
    result = summary(fit)
    ## Family: poisson(link = 'log')
## Iterations: 9000 from 3 chains.
## Segments:
##    n ~ 1 
##    n ~ 1 ~ 1 
## 
## Population-level parameters:
##   name     mean     X2.5    X97.5 rhat  eff    ts_se
##   cp_1 1888.333 1880.762 1897.354 1.01 1457 101.4664
##  int_1    1.170    0.980    1.359 1.00 3442   0.0236
##  int_2    0.478    0.244    0.718 1.00 4766   0.0278
